Ogre::Renderable::RenderSystemData

Ogre::Renderable::RenderSystemData Class Reference

An internal class that should be used only by a render system for internal use. More...

#include <OgreRenderable.h>

Detailed Description

An internal class that should be used only by a render system for internal use.

Remarks:
This class was created so a render system can associate internal data to this class. The need for this class started when the DX10 render system needed to save state objects.
